page.title: 11Folk Customs
page.content:
In Kilbribe,Irish Dancing is one of the most popular folk {customs.}The children who take lessons dance at festivals all over Northern Ireland where they win important competitions. In the six to eleven age group the most popular {dances }are reel,light double jig,single jig and hornpipe.
At Christmas quite a lot of{local children go out "Mumming". This is when they dress up as characters such as Bellzebub and Jonny Funny and go around the houses performing a small play and collecting money.
Closely akin to the{Mummers}are the people who make up verses about the local places or the local characters.
